title: Star (feat. Kaya)
lyrics:
I close my eyes
Geumbang tteoollilkkeoya
In your star, star, star, star
Hangsang malhaewass-eossjanh-a
Please see me now
Balago balaessdeon geol

In your star star, star, star, star



Ijeneun dondo naleul ttala ma-eumgwa haneun geos-eun gat-a

Ijen meomchul sun eobsjanh-a We got to go farther

Apman bogo naga apgil-eun deo balg-a Itâ€™s the come up

26beonjjae miyeoggug-eul samkin hue nado al-a ijen

Nugudeon buleobji anhdaneunge hyeonsiljeog-in jeongsinsangtaeinde

Geoulmanbomyeon ojig bujoghamgwa bin gong-ganman neukkindaneunge

Gakkeumssig chaggagdo hae hog-eun Maybe I just relapsed

Jinsil-i geojis gat-eun keun sesang-e chuwileul neukkyeo

Yosaeneun, magsang gosaengman gyeokkgo eoduwojin meoli sog-en

Pengwa sul-i seokk-in ingkeuleul jong-ie ssod-a bueonaeneun

I iyagiga geudaee him-i doegil balae Just know

Uliui chulseneun eod-eo geollin seong-gong-i aniya

Neoga malhaejwossjanh-a geumbang tteoollilkkeoya

Jeoldae ilh-eo beoliji mal-a neoui huimang-gwa mid-eum

Jal mandeul-eo naessjanh-a uliga balaessdeon gil-eul



I close my eyes

Geumbang tteoollilkkeoya

In your star, star, star, star

Hangsang malhaewass-eossjanh-a

Please see me now

Balago balaessdeon geol

In your star star, star, star, star

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

In your star star star star

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

In your star star star star



Nado gakkeum nun-eul gamgo jamsi haneul-eul bwa

Ttan gil-eul taeghaessdamyeon jigeum eodie iss-eulkka

Hog-eun nae salm-i daleulkka If I was in your star

Ne kkum-ui kkeut-i boyeossdamyeon Would you be where you are

Jeoldae ilh-eo beoliji mal-a neoui huimang-gwa mid-eum

Jal mandeul-eo naessjanh-a uliga balaessdeon gil-eul

Uliga nohjil moshan Vision haeya hal modeun Mission

Keep dreaming, keep believing kkog geulyeonaeja keun geulim-eul uh

Ojig 3-4myeong ap-e seossdeon mudaega eoneusae

Myeoch cheonmyeong ap-eseoneun mein mudaega doeeossne

Yeogineun jeonjaengteo naega seon gos-eun gaunde

Naega neom-eojyeodo himdeul-eodo Imma bounce back

Nugudeon kkoch gilman geodgo sipgessji

Pogileul inhae jug-eun kkumdeul modu Rest in peace

Muneojyeodo gwaenchanh-a dasi haenael su issjanh-a

Hanbeon hamyeon du beon dasi hal su iss-eo you and I



I close my eyes

Geumbang tteoollilkkeoya

In your star, star, star, star

Hangsang malhaewass-eossjanh-a

Please see me now

Balago balaessdeon geol

In your star star, star, star, star

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

In your star star star star

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

Oh oh oh oh

In your star star star star
